app.admin.security.page.title: Intric.ai – Admin – Security classifications
app.admin.security.page.header.title: Security
app.admin.security.settings.configuratio:
Select a security classification for all of you organisation's models.
Models will be available in spaces with the same or lower classification.
app.admin.security.settings.enabled.desc: Enable security classifications across your organisation's spaces.
app.admin.security.settings.enabled.dial: Do you want to enable security classifications for your organisation? This will limit the availablity of AI models based on their respective security setting.
Do you want to disable security classifications for your organisation? This will remove model restrictions from your spaces.
app.admin.security.settings.list.title: Classifications
app.admin.security.settings.list.descrip: Manage your organisation's security classifications and their descriptions.
app.admin.security.settings.list.empty: Your organisation does currently not have any security classifications configured.
app.admin.security.settings.create.title: Create a new security classification
app.admin.security.settings.create.descr: Describe when this classification should be chosen.

app.admin.usage.storage.summaryDescripti: See how much storage this organisation's spaces are taking up.
app.admin.usage.storage.publicSpacesDesc: See this organisation's public spaces and their storage use.
app.admin.usage.tokens.summaryDescriptio: See how many tokens this organisation's applications have been using broken down by vendor.

app.spaces.overview.title: Overview
app.spaces.overview.personalDescription: You can build and experiment with your own AI applications in your personal space.
app.spaces.members.title: Members
app.spaces.members.adminsEditorsDescript: People that can create and edit new assistants and apps, and manage this space's knowledge.
app.spaces.members.viewersDescription: People that can see and use this space's published assistants and apps.
app.spaces.members.noViewers: There are currently no viewers in this space
app.spaces.members.alreadyMember: This user is already a member of {name}
app.spaces.assistants.title: Assistants
app.spaces.assistants.groupChatDescripti: Group chats are an easy way to communicate with multiple assistants in a single session.
app.spaces.assistants.openGroupChatEdito: Open group chat editor after creation
features.templates.selector.createNewOrT: Create a new {resource} from scratch or get started with a premade {resource} from our template gallery.
features.templates.selector.createNewDes: Get started creating a new {resource} by entering a name below. You will be able to edit your {resource} after creation.
features.templates.selector.hasWizard: This template offers additional options. You can configure them in the next step.
app.spaces.assistants.noCompletionModels: This space does currently not have any completion models enabled. Enable at least one completion model to be able to create an assistant.
app.spaces.apps.title: Apps
app.spaces.apps.noCompletionModels: This space does currently not have any completion models enabled. Enable at least one completion model to be able to create an app.
app.spaces.apps.hint.title: intric Apps
app.spaces.apps.hint.description: Apps let you automate tasks with the help of powerful AI models. Start with a blank app or choose to start with one of our templates.
app.spaces.knowledge.title: Knowledge
app.spaces.knowledge.integrations.betaDe: This is an early version of our upcoming integrations feature. It might be unstable during the beta period.
app.spaces.knowledge.integrations.feedba: Please leave feedback on this feature or request other integrations
app.spaces.knowledge.collections.noEmbed: This space does currently not have any embedding models enabled. Enable at least one embedding model to be able to create a collection.
app.spaces.knowledge.collections.name: Name
app.spaces.knowledge.websites.noEmbeddin: This space does currently not have any embedding models enabled. Enable at least one embedding model to be able to connect to a website.
app.spaces.knowledge.websites.urlDescrip: Full URL to your sitemap.xml file
URL from where to start indexing (including https://)
app.spaces.knowledge.websites.displayNam: Optional, will default to the website's URL
app.spaces.knowledge.websites.downloadFi: This option is only available for basic crawls
app.spaces.knowledge.integrations.descri: Import knowledge from third-party platforms into intric. To use integrations, configure them in your
app.spaces.knowledge.integrations.enable: Enable {name} in your account settings to select this option
app.spaces.assistants.edit.title: Edit
app.spaces.assistants.edit.discardChange: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to discard all changes?
app.spaces.assistants.edit.name: Name
app.spaces.assistants.edit.nameDescripti: Give this assistant a name that will be displayed to its users.
app.spaces.assistants.edit.descriptionDe: A brief introducion to this assistant that will be shown when starting a new session.
app.spaces.assistants.edit.descriptionPl:
Hi, I'm {name}!
Ask me anything to get started.
app.spaces.assistants.edit.promptDescrip: Describe how this assistant should behave and how it will answer questions.
app.spaces.assistants.edit.attachmentsDe: Attach further instructions, for example guidelines or important information. The assistant will always see everything included as an attachment.
app.spaces.assistants.edit.knowledgeDesc: Select additional knowledge sources that this assistant will be able to search for relevant answers.
app.spaces.assistants.edit.completionMod: This model will be used to process the assistant's input and generate a response.
app.spaces.assistants.edit.modelBehaviou: Select a preset for how this model should behave, or configure its parameters manually.
app.spaces.assistants.edit.statusDescrip: Publishing your assistant will make it available to all users of this space, including viewers.
app.spaces.assistants.edit.insightsDescr: Collect insights about this assistant's usage and allow space editors and admins to access the full history of user questions.
app.spaces.assistants.edit.insightsPermi: Only space admins can toggle insights.
